movie.title: The Mercy
movie.plot: The incredible story of amateur sailor Donald Crowhurst and his solo attempt to circumnavigate the globe. The struggles he confronted on the journey while his family awaited his return is one of the most enduring mysteries of recent times.

events.title: the Teignmouth Electron is found abandoned
Donald Crowhurst writes his final confession
Donald Crowhurst begins his around the world sailing attempt in the Teignmouth Electron
